title: The Sibylline Oracle
description: VOTED GOODREADS BEST BOOK OF JUNE 2012! Book One of the Trilogy by BESTSELLING Author, DELIA COLVIN!"A mix of the easy charm and undying love from Twilight and the intelligence, wit, and mystery of The Da Vinci Code."Can love defy time? When she's rescued by handsome Alex Morgan, Valeria thinks she's found her happy ending. But Alex knows the terrifying truth...time is running out! And unless they can discover the source of an ancient curse, fate will take her life...again. Greek Mythology and modern romance intertwine in this addictive trilogy.THE SIBYLLINE TRILOGY - a love more enduring than life...than death...than destiny.
author: Delia J. Colvin
